类 BukkitObjectSerializerUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.handy.lib.util.BukkitObjectSerializerUtil

  • public final class BukkitObjectSerializerUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    序列化工具类(已过期,请使用ItemStackUtil)

    handy
    另请参阅:
    ItemStackUtil
